name: Flat Earth (Not Another Rude Bear Game)
name_original: Flat Earth (Not Another Rude Bear Game)
description:
Be careful what you build. Don’t flip the world over.

Wait, this isn’t a Rude Bear game?

Follow the tutorial, but outside of that some useful info:

Building costs can be seen by clicking the tabs.

  • House makes Woodcutters. Woodcutters cut wood.
  • Windmill makes Miners. Miners mine stone.
  • Archery Ranges make Archers. Archers are notoriously good at hitting things in the sky. Not that you’d need to do that in our peaceful land.
  • Churches make priests. Priests can heal the meek.
  • Castles make warriors. Warriors are good at defending the land.

Each building makes one person, and if your person unfortunately meets an untimely grave, you will gain a new person as long as you have the building. Take care of your buildings, put them in a useful place.
